message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, $9,000 is below its true value.  I could come down to $11,500, which is a significant compromise.
I understand you're trying to make a compromise, but $11,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to offer $10,250. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
